1000000000000011 0100001011100011 1 -> sum: 1100001011100111, cout: 0
1100101001100000 0010100001001100 1 -> sum: 1111001010101101, cout: 0
0011001000001101 0011011010110101 1 -> sum: 0110100011000011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
